biotools.summary: ZDOG: Zooming in on Dominating Genes with Mutations in Cancer Pathways ZDOG is an app for visualization of the extent to which mutated genes may affect cancer pathways using the dominating tree model. The dominator tree model allows us to examine conveniently the positional importance of a gene in cancer signalling pathways. This tool facilitates the identification of mutated “master” regulators even with low mutation frequency in deregulated signalling pathways.
